metadata.title: CVE-2021-39889 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In all versions of GitLab EE since version 14.1, due to an insecure directobject reference vulnerability, an endpoint may reveal the protected branchname to a malicious user who makes a crafted API call with the ID of theprotected branch.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
